page.title: 09Auchtermuchty Festival
page.content: For many years Auchtermuchty Festival was a{one day gala}for children and the Festival as we know it today started in{1981.}It takes about a year to organise and includes{ {a pageant, dances, St. Serf's Market, {traditional music competitions and {concerts, and fun and games.}Funds are raised from occasional discos but mainly from grants from local bodies. The Festival lasts approximately{2 {weeks}and is held in the first two weeks of August. This year the theme of the pageant is{France}because some French people from a village called{Saint Sandoux} are coming over for the Festival and they will be staying with local people. Everyone is looking forward to meeting and making friends with them, and perhaps learning some French.
